title: how are you ment to move up ranks when theres and afk or troll in allmost every other game?
body: im so over this has anyone got any ideas when afks r noticed in game there teamm sshouldnt lose lp?

replies.body: How can you not climb when there's afks and trolls on the enemy team almost every other game

I think besides the fact the there is more trolls and afks in Silver/bronze then riot care to notice. The whole system is floored, if you report a troll who has given up, they wont recive a ban unless they have said something in chat. and how often do you think people actually get banned? if your spending money, riot arent banning you. simple.
the rank system relys to heavily on the 4 other people you are paired with then the skill of yourself. 

-rant-
Sooo wrong, you forgot that there are also 5 other people on the enemy team (higher chance of the enemy team having a smurf)

From my own personal experience, sadly the only option is to throw yourself at the wall until it breaks.
Win games, lose games, make good plays, bad plays, take that risk, regret it immediately. It's all a learning experience, even with your team sometimes feeling like its holding you underwater while you're trying to swim.

And most importantly, after every game, ask yourself: "What could I have done to prevent that?" Because 9 times out of 10, you could have been doing something more.
It's not fair, it shouldn't be your responsibility to do everything, but life isn't fair and you need to prepare for that. Your top lost lane? There were probably times you could have ganked. Bot lane enemy adc dominated? You probably should have done something  when you noticed it.
There is always something you did wrong. Always.

The game can recognise that you are doing well. 
i.e. kda, objectives taken etc.
Even if you have an AFK or troll in your team you still have some say in how you get better.
If you start giving up you won't play as good.
Treat every game like a learning experience - granted that you should already know a lot of how your champion works and your capabilities with said champion. 

Eventually you will get matched with better and better players. 
It will take a while, sure, but you will climb.

It is actually 100% win or loss related.

I have over 3000 games I still get paired with first time blitz who never lands a pull and pushes wave without warding.
I'm talking about LP gain/loss, not matchmaking. You provided anecdotal example that doesn't even relate to LP gain/loss.
ikr, ive lost  6 ranked games in a row due to afks n trolls, went from s5 to b2 over last few days {{champion:122}}

iv gone from gold 2 to silver to in 3 months and its not lyk my game play has changed much i just feel teams with afks shouldnt lose lp the winning team should still game but y should 4 people lose out cause one persons internet stuffed out or they had to go out?

Afks are punished (heavier punishment for repeat offenders) and not all afks are intentional. 

I myself lost several games because i couldn't get into the game for about 5 minutes. Its not exactly easy to win a game when u start ur lane and theres a level 8 darius waiting for you. 

And for the trolls, they mainly exist in bronze but most people only troll if they lose their lane and instead of being sorry or doing anything about it they blame others and start trolling.

Take it from me, if you haven't spent much money on your account, you are better off making a new account and hoping to make it into silver ~~~~~
